Pre-Game Insights: Netherlands manager Ronald Koeman and Manchester City defender Nathan Ake were asked about the blackface controversy before the team's match against France.
Post-Match Reflections: The controversy surrounding the blackface incident has reignited a debate in Dutch culture, with opinions divided on whether it is racist or not.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The incident has also highlighted the complex history of Zwarte Piet in Dutch culture, with some arguing it is a harmless tradition and others seeing it as a racist stereotype.
Others: The Dutch national team has been dragged into the debate, with some players expressing their opinions on the matter, including Virgil van Dijk, who boycotted a TV show in 2020 after a host made a racist comment.
